message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high for me. Could you consider $100?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $100, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $95?
